comments: Great Professor, One of the only Professors at Brock who didn\'t bore me to death during the 4th year Marketing class. She seems very up to date with latest marketing strategies! Also a very nice and attractive professor.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  Respected (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Prof Mantonakis is hands down one of the best professors you will have at Brock. She genuinely cares for her students & their success which is a very rare trait. Even though the course is a lot of hard work & reading, it is by far the most enjoyable one I\'ve ever had. Every lecture is thought-provoking & relates to the real world. Amazing Prof!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  Respected (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  AMAZING LECTURES  RESPECTED
comments: This class was awesome! Professor M\'s classes are always exciting and engaging. She brought life to the text book by incorporating real life examples with each theory we learned. She goes above and beyond to help students relate and understand the material. (guest speakers, extra credit, social media interaction) Best teacher at Brock! She rocks!

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Antonia is a professor that clearly believes in the concept of hard work. She ensures that students who put their noses to the grindstone and focus on the material are rewarded for their efforts. This course has a substantial participation requirement and it is also crucial that the textbook is read. Antonia was one of my favourite professors.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  Respected (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Lacks the foundations of basic business knowledge -- she\'s trained in psychology. The thing I really didn\'t like about this class is how she treats students -- I felt like we were treated as high school kids. Posting blank powerpoint slides to keep people from skipping classes? By 4th year, I really don\'t think that\'s appropriate.

comments: Amazing Prof if you are interested in Marketing as a career path. She makes lessons extremely enjoyable and interesting. Tests are a little tough but very fair and exactly what she includes in her "checkmark" slides and some textbook terms. She knows her stuff and teaches in a way thay makes you remember concepts easily! Print slides before class.

comments: I just completed MGMT 1P96, and I must say that Antonia is one of the worst professors I\'ve had. She rambles on in lectures, doesn\'t know very much on subjects, and is extremely slow in returning tests/assignments.
